segments.text: Bing! We're all set for tonight, 8 o'clock.
segments.speaker: Doug

segments.text: Oh uh, as it turns out, we can't do it. Monica has to work.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Oh, my ex-wife didn't work, unless you call turning into her mother work. Fine. Tomorrow night then.
segments.speaker: Doug

segments.text: Oh uh well tomorrow's no good for her either.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: It's the semi-finals...of her...botchy ball tournament.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: What's going on Bing? Does uh, your wife have a problem with me or something?
segments.speaker: Doug

segments.text: Well now-now you're just talking crazy.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: So why can't the three of us go out together?
segments.speaker: Doug

segments.text: Because uh...we-we...we split up. Monica and I split up. Hold me.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Good God Bing I...well I can't say I'm altogether surprised, I saw the way she looked at you, and there was no love there.
segments.speaker: Doug

segments.text: And the way she looked at me, pure lust.
segments.speaker: Doug

segments.text: Y'know what would really help me through this tough time is choking something. Can I choke ya?
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Bing my boy, we're gonna get you over this.
segments.speaker: Doug

segments.text: Now here's the plan, grab your coat, we're going to a strip club.
segments.speaker: Doug

segments.text: Oh no-no-no, Monica would freak.  But to hell with that bitch.
segments.speaker: Chandler
